decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (000, 001, 002 and 003. Received 31st October 2016) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 2 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the side and rear walls of the outbuilding hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 3 - The outbuilding hereby permitted shall not be occupied at any time other than for purposes incidental to the residential use of the dwelling known as 52 Spinney Drive, TW14 8PN and the outbuilding shall not be used as a separate self-contained residential unit at any time.
description: Retrospective application for erection of an outbuilding in rear garden
